pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, July 15, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, July 15 2016:

Calgary, Alberta

9:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Genesis Centre Stampede Breakfast.

Genesis Centre
7555 Falconridge Blvd. N.E.
Calgary, Alberta

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:20 a.m.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister, the Premier of Alberta, Rachel Notley, and the Mayor of Calgary, Naheed Nenshi, will hold a photo opportunity.

Calgary Power Reception Hall, Historic City Hall
700 Macleod Trail South
Calgary, Alberta

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m.
  • Media should enter through front entrance (west entrance)
  • Media parking is available in the west lane of Macleod Trail between 8th Ave and 7th Ave after 9:30am and until 1pm. The east laneways will not be available.

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with the Premier of Alberta, Rachel Notley. A media availability will follow.

Calgary Power Reception Hall, Historic City Hall
700 Macleod Trail South
Calgary, Alberta

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for announcement and media availability

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Calgary Stampede Grandstand Rodeo.

Calgary Stampede
Grandstand Stage
Calgary, Alberta

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only

Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
